title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2107.2 - Proceedings instituted by the local rent administrator on his own initiative
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2107.2 - Proceedings instituted by the local rent administrator on his own initiative

State Regulations

The local rent administrator may institute a proceeding
on his own initiative whenever he deems it necessary or appropriate pursuant to
the act or this Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2107.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
